Communication.Name: Communication
Communication.Description: An instance of the R4 Communication FHIR resource.

basedOn.Name: basedOn
basedOn.Description: Reference to a ServiceRequest that represents the CCSC referral request metadata. Each communication can be based on only one ServiceRequest.

inResponseTo.Name: inResponseTo
inResponseTo.Description: The message this communication is in response to, if applicable. At most, each communication is “in response to” only one message.

partOf.Name: partOf
partOf.Description: Reference to a Task that represents the CCSC referral request status. Each communication can be a part of only one Task.

contentReference.Name: contentReference
contentReference.Description: Contains a reference to a DocumentReference resource that justifies the CCSC referral request. This links to a .PDF document that can be retrieved on demand.

contentString.Name: contentString
contentString.Description: Contains the content. Append all payload.contentString elements together to form the entire message body.

recipient.Name: recipient
recipient.Description:
The recipient of the communication, using one of the following:

A reference to practitioner resource from the Health System.

OR

A reference to an organization resource representing the CBO, where the following information is stored:

  • identifier (identifier): Contains the external CBO ID that was given when the CBO was imported into the Epic system.
  • name (string): CBO name

sender.Name: sender
sender.Description: This is the sender of the communication, and it is the reverse of the recipient field. Either the Health System is the sender and the CBO is the recipient, or vice-versa.

sent.Name: sent
sent.Description: The date and time when the communication was sent.

subject.Name: subject
subject.Description: Focus of the communication, reference to a patient resource.

Communication.Name: Communication
Communication.Description: An instance of the R4 Communication FHIR resource.
